title: The Shape of Water
description: An other-worldly fairy tale, set against the backdrop of Cold War era America circa 1962. In the hidden high-security government laboratory where she works, lonely Elisa (Sally Hawkins) is trapped in a life of isolation. Elisa's life is changed forever when she and co-worker Zelda (Octavia Spencer) discover a secret classified experiment.
genre: Adventure | Drama | Fantasy | Horror | Romance | Thriller

title: Eso
description: A group of bullied kids band together when a shapeshifting monster, taking the appearance of a clown, begins hunting children.

title: ¡Huye!
description: It's time for a young African American to meet with his white girlfriend's parents for a weekend in their secluded estate in the woods, but before long, the friendly and polite ambience will give way to a nightmare.

title: Jigsaw: El juego continúa
description: Bodies are turning up around the city, each having met a uniquely gruesome demise. As the investigation proceeds, evidence points to one suspect: John Kramer, the man known as Jigsaw, who has been dead for ten years.

title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer
description: Steven, a charismatic surgeon, is forced to make an unthinkable sacrifice after his life starts to fall apart, when the behavior of a teenage boy he has taken under his wing turns sinister.

title: La torre oscura
description: The last Gunslinger, Roland Deschain, has been locked in an eternal battle with Walter O'Dim, also known as the Man in Black, determined to prevent him from toppling the Dark Tower, which holds the universe together. With the fate of the worlds at stake, good and evil will collide in the ultimate battle as only Roland can defend the Tower from the Man in Black.
genre: Action | Adventure | Fantasy | Horror | Sci-Fi | Western

title: Better Watch Out
description: On a quiet suburban street, a babysitter must defend a twelve-year-old boy from intruders, only to discover it's far from a normal home invasion.

title: Fragmentado
description: Three girls are kidnapped by a man with a diagnosed 23 distinct personalities. They must try to escape before the apparent emergence of a frightful new 24th.

title: The Predator
description: A sequel to the 1987 sci-fi film "Predator"

title: Feliz día de tu muerte
description: A college student must relive the day of her murder over and over again, in a loop that will end only when she discovers her killer's identity.

title: Mother!
description: A couple's relationship is tested when uninvited guests arrive at their home, disrupting their tranquil existence.

title: The Babysitter
description: The events of one evening take an unexpected turn for the worst for a young boy trying to spy on his babysitter.

title: Dismissed
description: An idealistic, straight-edge teacher is drawn down a horrid rabbit hole by an honors student when he gives him a B+ on a paper.

title: A Quiet Place
description: A family live an isolated existence in utter silence, for fear of an unknown threat that follows and attacks at any sound.

title: Venom
description: This plot is unknown.

title: El regreso del demonio
description: Sheriff Dan Tashtego and a team of creeper hunters enlist the help of officer Davis Tubbs to help stop the monster's eating spree.

title: Beyond Skyline
description: A tough-as-nails detective embarks on a relentless pursuit to free his son from a nightmarish alien warship.

title: El Hombre de Nieve
description: Detective Harry Hole investigates the disappearance of a woman whose pink scarf is found wrapped around an ominous-looking snowman.

title: Alien: Covenant
description: The crew of a colony ship, bound for a remote planet, discover an uncharted paradise with a threat beyond their imagination, and must attempt a harrowing escape.
A simple yet proud farmer in the year 1922 conspires to murder his wife for financial gain, convincing his teenage son to participate.

title: Gerald's Game
description: While trying to spice up their marriage in their remote lake house, Jessie must fight to survive when her husband dies unexpectedly, leaving her handcuffed to their bed frame.

title: Annabelle 2: la creación
description: 12 years after the tragic death of their little girl, a dollmaker and his wife welcome a nun and several girls from a shuttered orphanage into their home, where they soon become the target of the dollmaker's possessed creation, Annabelle.

title: Annihilation
description: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition where the laws of nature don't apply.
genre: Adventure | Drama | Fantasy | Horror | Mystery | Sci-Fi | Thriller

title: Life: vida inteligente
description: A team of scientists aboard the International Space Station discover a rapidly evolving life form that caused extinction on Mars and now threatens all life on Earth.

title: Flatliners
description: Five medical students, obsessed by what lies beyond the confines of life, embark on a daring experiment: by stopping their hearts for short periods, each triggers a near-death experience - giving them a firsthand account of the afterlife.
